summary: AN ORDINANCE providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights necessary for the Lawton Wood Sanitary Sewer Project in Government Lot 4, Section 10, Township 25 North, Range 3 East, W.M., under Local Improvement District No. 6716 as created by Ordinance No. 108568; as a part of certain additions and betterments to the existing municipal sewerage utility, and providing payment therefor.
